captions.text:
Your life is spinnin'
out of control

Seems the whole world
is out to get you

Everything is wrong
Nothin' seems right

There's a sinking feeling
inside

Even your best friend
has turned his back

But you can't let it
bring you down
No, you've got to fight

'Cause you try
but you can't let go

It's when you're down
that you gotta get up

Don't let 'em walk
all over your face
Stand up for yourself

And make everything
right again

Even if some guy's tryin'
to blackmail you

And your girlfriend
thinks you suck

It's up to you
to let them know

That it was all part of
some rich guy's evil plan

Look out ahead
There's a truck changin' lanes

- [ Truck Horn Blares ]
- You got some yellow crumbs
on your upper lip

And those warts on your dick
aren't gonna go away

'Less you start using
topical cream everyday

'Less you start using
topical cream everyday
